publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3329 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Batasuna Ban-That the Parliament regrets the decision of the Spanish Government to disenfranchise the voters, members and supporters of the Basque nationalist party Batasuna by the imposition of an undemocratic ban on its legitimate activities in furthering the cause of Basque independence.

S1M-3329 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Batasuna Banâ€”That the Parliament regrets the decision of the Spanish Government to disenfranchise the voters, members and supporters of the Basque nationalist party Batasuna by the imposition of an undemocratic ban on its legitimate activities in furthering the cause of Basque independence.
S1M-3329 Batasuna Ban (lodged on 29 August 2002) Mr John McAllion*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3329 Batasuna Ban (lodged on 29 August 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3329 Batasuna Ban (lodged on 29 August 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
